entry.title: Wednesday night: A few flurries. Low minus 8.
entry.summary: A few flurries ending early this evening then clearing. Wind northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light early this evening. Low minus 8. Wind chill minus 11 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Wednesday 15 March 2023
